title: "go_enrichment"
---

```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, message = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r message=FALSE}
go_raw <- read_csv("gene_ontology_csv.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()
```


```{r message=FALSE}
go_edited <- read_csv("gene_ontology_csv.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(gene_name, accession, go_term, namespace) %>% 
  distinct(gene_name, .keep_all = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(namespace = case_when(namespace == "molecular_function" ~ "MF",
                   namespace == "biological_process" ~ "BP",
                   namespace == "cellular_component" ~ "CP",
                   TRUE ~ "other" ))
```

```{r}
pathways <- read_csv("pathways.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()

pathways_merged <- left_join(pathways, go_raw, by="locus_tag")
```
